subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets are waiting for Tom Glavine to decide whether to re-sign with them or to finish off his splendid career where it began, with the Atlanta Braves.
snippet: The Mets are waiting for Tom Glavine to decide whether to re-sign with them or to finish off his splendid career where it began, with the Atlanta Braves.
